parameters.name: X-API-TOKEN
parameters.description: The API token to be used for authentication

parameters.name: X-Requested-With
parameters.description: Used to send the XMLHttpRequest header

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include child relations of the Activity object, format is comma separated. **Note** it is possible to chain multiple includes together, ie. include=account,token

history.summary: include=history will include the history object in the response (This could include references to the backup HTML of the entity)

user.summary: include=user will include the user object in the response

client.summary: include=client will include the client object in the response

recurring_invoice.summary: include=recurring_invoice will include the recurring_invoice object in the response

invoice.summary: include=invoice will include the invoice object in the response

credit.summary: include=credit will include the credit object in the response

quote.summary: include=quote will include the quote object in the response

payment.summary: include=payment will include the payment object in the response

expense.summary: include=expense will include the expense object in the response

vendor_contact.summary: include=vendor_contact will include the vendor_contact object in the response

vendor.summary: include=vendor will include the vendor object in the response

purchase_order.summary: include=purchase_order will include the purchase_order object in the response

task.summary: include=task will include the task object in the response
